New-York Historical Society collection of caricatures and cartoons

No title. [Man (Sydney Rosenfeld) dressed in dress and bonnet, holding out bag of money labelled "Subscribers" "Contributors" to female figure dressed in toga labelled "Century Theater". On other side, male figure in toga, arms crossed, labelled "Nat'l Arts Theater".]

No title. [Man (Sydney Rosenfeld) dressed in dress and bonnet, holding out bag of money labelled "Subscribers" "Contributors" to female figure dressed in toga labelled "Century Theater". On other side, male figure in toga, arms crossed, labelled "Nat'l Arts Theater".]

Drawing. Signed PAL. On back [in blue pencil] "The Leap Year Theatrical Proposal Mr. Sydney Rosenfeld as the shy damsel. The National Arts Theater as the jilted lover. The Century Theater as the sought lover." Acquisition(?) date on back: Feb. 2, 1921.
New-York Historical Society collection of caricatures and cartoons
